txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Heavy carapaces from the insects and spiders north of Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'I am certain that we will be able to find a use for these.'
'If you happen upon any of the tougher types of insects to the north be sure to collect everything from them, I am certain that we can find a use for most everything that you find from them.'
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of heavy carapaces to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the heavy carapaces to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering heavy carapaces from the insects and spiders north of Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Heavy carapaces from the insects and spiders north of Oatbarton.
